thread.title: Great hotel in convenient location
thread.title_full: Great hotel in convenient location - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Robin S
title: Great hotel in convenient location
text: Our family stayed over spring break. Good sized, clean, comfortable room with great views of New York. Great location close to Broadway theatres, restaurants, Times Square, and shopping. Also very close to several subway stops. I definitely recommend this hotel.
